author: Nintendo of America
description:
Jump into Fortnite Festival’s latest season now on Nintendo Switch 2 and Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/fortnite-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1064-01&utm_id=P1064-01   

Plastic beach, meet concrete jungle. Gorillaz have crossed over and crash-landed into a whole new universe as the latest Fortnite Icons.   

Snag the 2D and Noodle Outfits now in the Item Shop with the Noodle & 2D Bundle, complete with themed cosmetics and the DARE Emote — and earn the Murdoc and Russel Outfits through the Fortnite Festival Season 10 Music Pass! 

#NintendoSwitch2 #NintendoSwitch #Fortnite #Gorillaz #FortniteFestival 


Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

title: Fortnite Festival – Gorillaz Official Trailer – Nintendo Switch 2
